description: A request by a patron for a specific item

requestLevel.description: Level of the request - Item or Title

requestType.description: Whether the item should be held upon return, recalled or paged for

proxyUserId.description: ID of the user representing a proxy for the patron

instanceId.description: ID of the instance being requested

holdingsRecordId.description: ID of the holdings record being requested

itemId.description: ID of the item being requested

cancellationReasonId.description: The id of the relevant request reason

cancelledByUserId.description: The id of the user that cancelled the request

cancellationAdditionalInformation.description: Potential relevant information regarding a cancellation

position.description: Position of the request in the unified request queue

instance.description: Copy of some instance metadata (used for searching and sorting)

identifiers.description: An extensible set of name-value pairs of identifiers associated with the resource

identifierTypeId.description: UUID of resource identifier type (e.g. ISBN, ISSN, LCCN, CODEN, Locally defined identifiers)

item.description: Copy of some item metadata (used for searching and sorting)

requester.description: Copy of some requesting patron metadata (used for searching and sorting)

firstName.description: first name of the requesting patron

lastName.description: last name of the requesting patron

middleName.description: middle name of the requesting patron

patronGroup.description: DEPRECATED, to be removed in subsequent major version

proxy.description: Copy of some proxy patron metadata (used for searching and sorting)

firstName.description: first name of the proxy patron

lastName.description: last name of the proxy patron

middleName.description: middle name of the proxy patron

patronGroup.description: DEPRECATED, to be removed in subsequent major version

fulfilmentPreference.description: How should the request be fulfilled (whether the item should be kept on the hold shelf for collection or delivered to the requester)

deliveryAddressTypeId.description: Deliver to the address of this type, for the requesting patron

holdShelfExpirationDate.description: Date when an item returned to the hold shelf expires

pickupServicePointId.description: The ID of the Service Point where this request can be picked up

metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to requests, provided by the server (client should not provide)

awaitingPickupRequestClosedDate.description: A date when the request with awaiting pickup status was closed
